article_metadata.description: Not since the departure of the Walsh & Packard hardware store on South Street nearly 10 years ago, has there been such a sense of sadness in Hingham Square at the closing of a business. Departure of any shop can evoke powerful emotion – but the announcement that Noble’s Camera Shop is going out of business came as a real shock.Noble’s at 29 Main St. did not feel so much like a shop as a family where people like Brian Noble, Larry Corthell, Wendy MacQuarrie, Jean Holley, Rhonda

og.description: Not since the departure of the Walsh & Packard hardware store on South Street nearly 10 years ago, has there been such a sense of sadness in Hingham
og.title: HINGHAM EDITORIAL: Farewell to Noble’s
